official-title.#text: Making continuing appropriations for veterans benefits for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes.

text.#text: That the following sums are hereby appropriated, out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, and out of applicable corporate or other revenues, receipts, and funds, for veterans benefits for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes, namely:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}fund.#text: Amounts are provided for entitlements and other mandatory payments whose budget authority was provided in the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Military Construction and Veterans Affairs, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Military Construction and Veterans Affairs, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2013

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}prop.#text: to continue activities at the rate to maintain program levels under current law, under the authority and conditions provided in the applicable appropriations Act for fiscal year 2013, to be continued through the date specified in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , obligations for mandatory payments due on or about the first day of any month that begins after October 2013 but not later than 30 days after the date specified in
may continue to be made, and funds shall be available for such payments.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}prop.#tail: at a rate for operations of

quote.#text: Department of Veterans Affairs—Departmental Administration—General Operating Expenses, Veterans Benefits Administration

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: and shall be available to the extent and in the manner that would be provided by such Act.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Military Construction and Veterans Affairs, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Military Construction and Veterans Affairs, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2013

italic.#tail: That such amount shall be made available subject to the authority and conditions as provided under the

text.#text: Unless otherwise provided for in this joint resolution or in the applicable appropriations Act for fiscal year 2014, appropriations and funds made available and authority granted pursuant to this joint resolution shall be available until whichever of the following first occurs:
the enactment into law of an appropriation for any project or activity provided for in this joint resolution;
the enactment into law of the applicable appropriations Act for fiscal year 2014 without any provision for such project or activity; or

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: that this joint resolution may also be referred to as the

quote.#text: Honoring Our Promise to America’s Veterans Act

text.#text: This joint resolution may be cited as the

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives October 3, 2013.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HJ 72 EH: Veterans Benefits Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014
